data.comment: The match has started.
Dae Yong Kim signals a Jeonbuk throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half.
In the minute 3, Jeonbuk move into a 1-0 lead through a Lee Sung-yoon header.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Jeonbuk.
In the minute 7, Jeonbuk needs to be cautious. Sangju Sangmu have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Jeonbuk.
In the minute 14, Goal! Sangju Sangmu draw level to 1-1 through a Oh Hyeon-gyu header.
Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
Dae Yong Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 19, Free kick Jeonbuk.
Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Jeonbuk.
In the minute 21, Sangju Sangmu to take a throw-in in Jeonbuk territory.
Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
Kwon Kyung-won for Sangju Sangmu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 24, Ball goes out of play for a Jeonbuk goal kick.
At Jeonju World Cup Stadium, Sangju Sangmu are penalized for being offside.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, Jeonbuk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
In the minute 33, Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 38, Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
Can Jeonbuk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half?
In the minute 41, Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
In the minute 43, In Jeonju a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Dae Yong Kim awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
Jeonbuk to take a throw-in in Sangju Sangmu territory.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Sangju Sangmu have a goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Jeonju.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Jeonbuk awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 46, Han Kyo-won is replacing Lee Sung-yoon for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Jeonju.
Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Jeonbuk just outside Sangju Sangmu's area.
In the minute 49, Sangju Sangmu's Ko Myeong-seok has been booked in Jeonju.
Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Dae Yong Kim signals a Jeonbuk throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half.
In the minute 51, Dae Yong Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Jeonbuk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half?
Dae Yong Kim awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 56, Jeonbuk awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 60, Jeonbuk have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
Kim Tae-wan is making the team's first substitution at Jeonju World Cup Stadium with Park Dong-jin replacing Oh Hyeon-gyu.
In the minute 62, Takahiro Kunimoto is replacing Kim Bo-kyung for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Jeonju.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 66, Jeonbuk to take a throw-in in Sangju Sangmu territory.
Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 72, Jeonbuk have a goal kick.
Kim Jin-su (Jeonbuk) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Jeonbuk in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
The away team replace Kang Ji-hun with Lee Sang-ki.
In the minute 83, Free kick Jeonbuk.
Dae Yong Kim signals a Jeonbuk throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half.
Jo Gue-sung is on a sub for Lee Seung-ki for Jeonbuk.
In the minute 85, Dae Yong Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Gustavo heads in to make it 2-1 at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
Jeonbuk drive forward but Gustavo is judged offside.
Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Dae Yong Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Jeonju.
The match has come to a close in Jeonju. The final score is 2-1.
Gustavo (Jeonbuk) gets a yellow card.
